item.description:
You MUST buy your ticket directly from the Steamship Co.--Please DO NOT RSVP here until you have.

http://www.islesofshoals.com/cart/index.php?event_id=4936

 

Date: Saturday, August 18, 2012
Time: 10:55 AM - 05:15 PM
Star Island Stopover Cost: $41.00

 

Itinerary

Arrive Portsmouth: 9:45 AM (We need to be at the dock no later than 10:00!)
Boarding Starts at: 10:25 AM
Depart from Portsmouth: 10:55 AM
Arrive at Star Island: 12:00 PM
Leave Star: 4:00 PM
Arrive back in Portsmouth: 5:15 PM

 

Extras to Bring

Water
Lunch or snacks (I'll try to find out if the snack bar will be open.)
Sunscreen
Bug Spray
Beach Towel (It was nice to have when taking time out to enjoy the view from the rocks last year.)


ABOUT THE ISLAND

Star Island is located ten miles off the coast of New Hampshire. It is the second largest of the nine islands that make up the Isles of Shoals and its historic Oceanic House and adjacent buildings become the village home for thousands of visitors each summer.

The nonprofit Star Island Corporation has owned and operated Star Island since 1916, providing affordable individual and family retreats. From June to September guests come for a day, an overnight visit or to attend one of the many conferences presented each summer on a range of subjects such as natural history, writing, photography, music, painting, ecology, matters of the spirit, yoga and more.
item.name: Daytrip to Star Island
